popular-movies.title: KonoSuba: God's Blessing on This Wonderful World!
popular-movies.description: Kazuma and his chaotic crew, led by a useless goddess, dive into a fantasy world full of laughs and epic fails. Pure isekai hilarity!

popular-movies.title: No Game No Life
popular-movies.description: Sora and Shiro, gaming prodigies, get isekai’d to a world where games rule. Outsmarting everyone with style and sass, they’re unbeatable!

popular-movies.title: Another
popular-movies.description: A creepy school mystery where death lurks around every corner. Mei Misaki and her cursed class will keep you on edge in this horror gem!

popular-movies.title: The Disastrous Life of Saiki K.
popular-movies.description: Saiki’s psychic powers make his life a comedy disaster. All he wants is peace, but his wacky friends say nope! Hilarious from start to finish.

popular-movies.title: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime
popular-movies.description: Rimuru, a slime with god-tier powers, builds a monster utopia in an isekai world. It’s wholesome, funny, and packed with epic battles!

popular-movies.title: Gintama
popular-movies.description: Gintoki’s samurai life in alien-infested Japan is a wild ride of parodies, action, and absurd humor. Nothing’s off-limits in this comedy masterpiece!

popular-movies.title: Re:zero
popular-movies.description: Subaru Natsuki was just trying to get to the convenience store but wound up summoned to another world. He encounters the usual things--life-threatening situations, silver haired beauties, cat fairies--you know, normal stuff. All that would be bad enough, but he's also gained the most inconvenient magical ability of all--time travel, but he's got to die to use it. How do you repay someone who saved your life when all you can do is die?

popular-movies.title: Jujutsu Kaisen( thầy cúng báo đời)
Movie of century(Bom tấn thế kỷ 21)
